name: LupusTalk
_source: s;Lupus;Yeah. I'm really, really nervous.|I mean, who haven't we pissed off now?
s;Lupus;Like, we've got the whole world against us!|I mean...
s;Simon;If you want to split, I'll look the other way.
s;Simon;A strange thing for a Lord to say, but I'm serious.
s;Lupus;Heh... haha, Simon if I split you wouldn't have a chance of catching me.
s;Lupus;...Yeah.{w} Thanks, though.|Nerves just got to me.|You can rely on me, I promise.
